title: The Sieve Effect
story_summary: Old BCI records suddenly reappear, mixing the past with the present in Stenograd. Chaos spreads as people lose jobs and trust. The Council faces public blame on live broadcasts. Under pressure, they finally shut down the BCI and open a citywide debate on memory and forgiveness.

official.headline: Records Reshuffled
official.anchor_line: Today, residents experienced updates to the Behavioral Compliance Index, reflecting Stenograd's commitment to a transparent society.
official.contextual_reframing: The integration of historical data ensures equitable treatment for all and demonstrates the system's ongoing self-improvement.

official.headline: Public Voices Heard
official.anchor_line: Citizens gathered across city squares, engaging constructively with Council representatives on data accountability.
official.contextual_reframing: Open forums demonstrate system responsiveness, fostering unity and transparent dialogue.

official.headline: BCI System Paused
official.anchor_line: The Council announces a responsible suspension of the BCI scoring system to allow citywide reflection and constructive discussion.
official.contextual_reframing: This prudent action ensures collective progress, recognizing Stenograd's dynamic adaptation for the benefit of all citizens.

underground.headline: Your Past Unleashed
underground.anchor_line: Last night, the system dug up our old secrets - jobs lost, doors slammed, all on a silent timer.
underground.contextual_reframing: BCI 'transparency' means no crime is ever forgotten. They call it progress. We call it chains.

underground.headline: Crowds Demand Answers
underground.anchor_line: Stenograd's control cracks as thousands swarm Council buildings, raging against manipulated records and vanished rights.
underground.contextual_reframing: For all their talk of order, officials finally face those they tried to erase. No more hiding behind screens.

underground.headline: BCI Goes Dark
underground.anchor_line: After days of chaos, the Council pulled the plug on BCI. They blame 'reflection' - we know it's panic.
underground.contextual_reframing: Years of control, undone by one leak. Now everyone remembers - and no one can pretend it never happened.
